dialog:
804290: @British_Airways how long is it before you contact someone who's  taken my bag by mistake. I've got a lost luggage ref number. Got told today that a similar bag got left so that's who probably has mine. I've got the majority of my clothes in it and want them back asap.
British_Airways: @804290 We're sorry, Dan. If we delivered your bag to the carousel and someone else picked it up we're not responsible for contacting them on your behalf. However, if there's been a bag left behind we'll do all we can to get in touch with that customer for them to retrieve it. ^Julie
British_Airways: @804290 We're sorry, Dan. If we delivered your bag to the carousel and someone else picked it up we're not responsible for contacting them on your behalf. However, if there's been a bag left behind we'll do all we can to get in touch with that customer for them to retrieve it. ^Julie
British_Airways: @804290 Hi Dan, I can appreciate your frustration. Unfortunately, we're unable to do anything until your bag has been returned, as you already know. You could contact the police and report your bag as stolen, or file a lost bag claim with your travel insurance company. ^Linds
summary: Someone else has taken their bag after a flight and left their own similar case and wants to know when BA will contact the customer, also asks when they can make an insurance claim. dialog:
633638: @VerizonSupport I need help. I do not have your service (6+ hours to setup and cancel an install!)  but the previous homeowner did. There is an ONT in the basement that sends out a loud, very annoying beep every 15 minutes? This is ridiculous. How do I stop it?
VerizonSupport: @633638 Press and hold the alarm silence button/ONT reboot button on the unit for 30 seconds.  That will silence it.
^ACM
VerizonSupport: @633638 Try unplugging the power and removing the battery. After 3mins, put the battery back in and power on. This should help with the beeping. Let us know. ^DDG
VerizonSupport: @633638 Yes, you can do that since you do not have service with us. When the battery is dead the beeping will stop. 
^HSB
summary: Customer is complaining that there is an ONT in the basement that send a loud beep evry 15 mins and they do not have any service. Agent updates that they can unplug it and remove the battery forever since they do not have service wth them, when battery is dead, the beeping will automatically stops.

dialog:
182172: @SW_Help the 2120 Salisbury train from Waterloo. Not really getting much info guys....
182172: @SW_Help So it was incorrectly coupled?? Really???? Your driver decoupled and recoupled it and the doors "magically worked". Serious breach in protocol there guys. Playing with safety because previous driver wanted to clock out.
SW_Help: @182172 On occasion the electrical contacts that the trains use to pass communications for door controls, power and brake, information systems, etc will not make contact properly. In these cases, detaching and reattaching is the approved process taken in line with our fleet 1/3
SW_Help: @182172 team's fault-finding instructions, and done under the instruction of maintenance staff and the fleet control manager. The train's fail-safe systems would not allow it to move in this situation, and if we could not resolve the problem, the train would be taken out of service. 2/3
182172: @SW_Help So wait a second. Once a driver couples the train it's not protocol to test immediately, but to wait until the carriages are full of passengers to then couple? That's your statement?
summary: Customer is asking that salisbury train from waterloo. Agent updated that he was giving information more detailed, running a railway often gas a lot more to it than it appears.

dialog:
182172: @SW_Help So it was incorrectly coupled?? Really???? Your driver decoupled and recoupled it and the doors "magically worked". Serious breach in protocol there guys. Playing with safety because previous driver wanted to clock out.
182172: @SW_Help So it was incorrectly coupled?? Really???? Your driver decoupled and recoupled it and the doors "magically worked". Serious breach in protocol there guys. Playing with safety because previous driver wanted to clock out.
SW_Help: @182172 On occasion the electrical contacts that the trains use to pass communications for door controls, power and brake, information systems, etc will not make contact properly. In these cases, detaching and reattaching is the approved process taken in line with our fleet 1/3
SW_Help: @182172 team's fault-finding instructions, and done under the instruction of maintenance staff and the fleet control manager. The train's fail-safe systems would not allow it to move in this situation, and if we could not resolve the problem, the train would be taken out of service. 2/3
SW_Help: @182172 Safety is, and always will be, our first priority, and in this case protocols were followed correctly. Our fleet team will investigate using on-board monitoring systems as to what when wrong in this case and take appropriate action. ^DB 3/3
182172: @SW_Help So wait a second. Once a driver couples the train it's not protocol to test immediately, but to wait until the carriages are full of passengers to then couple? That's your statement?
SW_Help: @182172 type in question are making suitable contact. Any one of these pins not making proper contact can result in the train not being able to move as part of fail-safe systems built in. As mentioned, more modern trains such as our 450 and 444 types have computer systems on board 2/3
SW_Help: @182172 I always try to give something a bit more detailed, running a railway often has a lot more to it than it appears (I was recently conversing with @20997 about emissions standards, which was an interesting research topic). Benefits of 6 years experience though! ^DB
SW_Help: @182172 I always try to give something a bit more detailed, running a railway often has a lot more to it than it appears (I was recently conversing with @20997 about emissions standards, which was an interesting research topic). Benefits of 6 years experience though! ^DB
summary: Customer complaints about the train where the driver is decoupled and recoupled and doors automatically works. Agent states that they will give little information about running the railway than it appears and had some conversation about emission standards which is a good topic.

SpotifyCares: @213284 Hey Jack! Can you let us know the exact device you're using as well as the operating system versions it's running? /JL
213284: @SpotifyCares iPhone 7 Plus, running 11.0.2. currently the log in screen just says "Log In" at the top, and the running intro video loop
213284: @SpotifyCares It takes ~5 minutes between pressing ‚ÄúLog In‚Äù and getting to that screen. Then it holds there, with the video looping. Reinstalled twice
213284: @SpotifyCares I figured out a fix after this happening a few times: go back to main screen, press Log In again: correct screen loads
213284: @SpotifyCares Literally, it's go back a page, go forward again.
213284: @SpotifyCares Yes. I logged out & shut down app. It took ten minutes to blank log in screen + additional blank screens for every time I hit "Log In"...
213284: @SpotifyCares ...after that: I had to hit "back" button many times to get to original screen, pressed Log In, that worked. Log Out w/o App quit is normal
SpotifyCares: @213284 Just to confirm, does this also happen on any other device you have? Trying a different network connection might also help /JL
213284: @SpotifyCares I see no reason to un/reinstall the application on desktop or continue to test this on different networks. Problem began with new mobile app
SpotifyCares: @213284 We understand. Let's continue troubleshooting on your phone. Can you DM us your account's username and email address? /JL https://t.co/ldFdZRiNAt

British_Airways: @223071 Hi Thamin, if you arrived after check-in for your flight had closed we wouldn't be able to accept you for the flight. Even if the airport is quiet, check in times still need to be met. ^Natalie
223071: @British_Airways Natalie I was 5min late. Plane wasn't expected to leave for 55min, airport was empty, pretty sure security would be too, (would guess the plane was too)I'm confident I could have made it to the gate with ample time, with just a tiny bit of your help.
British_Airways: @223071 Hi Thamin, I'm afraid this isn't something we can offer any flexibility with. It's not possible to check in for a flight after check in closes, as the system doesn't allow it. Late arrivals can cause flight delays and we apply the same policy to everyone, not just when it's 1/2
British_Airways: @223071 busy. I can understand your disappointment, but it's your responsibility to arrive at the airport in good time and complete check in before it closes. ^Beth S. 2/2
summary: Customer is complaining that more staff then passengers, terrible customer service & amp and still can't get on the plane though it is not due to leave for 50 min. Agent updated that if they are late to check in and there isn't anyway for them to make the flight , even if the flight is delayed.

701061: @AdobeCare I bought LR5 in July 2013, subscribed to CC in Nov 2013. Stopped CC last month, now I can't use develop mode in LR5. Any advice?

701061: @AdobeCare As long as it's not the same guy working the online chat on your website tonight, he was useless. Feel free to postpone the answers until tomorrow morning if necessary, anyone but him please.
summary: Customer is asking that he can't use develop mode in LR5. Agent is asking to customer if he doesn't mind to private messaging his Adobe id so they can look into it.

dialog:

337822: @UPSHelp I called twice, Friday and today. They told me it couldn't be delivered today because warehouse is closed (WTF). I needed it 1/2
UPSHelp: @337822 With the warehouse being closed there is nothing that we can do to override this and have the package delivered. ^QJ https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ
UPSHelp: @337822 If the shipper did not request a Saturday delivery and the package is in warehouse it will not move until the next business day.

summary: Customer complaints on product shipped to wrong address. Agent ask the customer to DM for further assistance.

dialog:
525295: @Delta You were right, nice flight.  I got a problem though!  While in the plane with my carryon, the flight attendant slammed the over he'd door on the handle and broke my carryon!
Delta: @525295 Oh, no! I am so disappointed to hear that. It is best to take the damaged bag to our Baggage Service Office and have them review the damages. *AJL
Delta: @525295 Oh, no! I am so disappointed to hear that. It is best to take the damaged bag to our Baggage Service Office and have them review the damages. *AJL
525295: @Delta Is there a way to do it any other way?  I landed at midnight in Pittsburgh and nothing was open!  Thank you for your quick response though!
Delta: @525295 Regretfully, the airport Baggage Services has to make a report and document damages to make sure that this gets taken care of. This would be the only place that could do it. *TBW
Delta: @525295 Hi Andy, I am so sorry. You can also file online as well.  We do need to know the purchase price, the age of the bag and a description of the damage. You could upload a picture Please use this link to our website. https://t.co/fPLXqv8KGq Thank you. *TJM
summary: Customer is complaining about  flight door handle broken his carryon. Agent is replying that take a damaged bag to baggage service as  they will review the damages.

dialog:
315643: @British_Airways My partner booked a return flight, did not go on the outward journey and now can't check in on her flight back, plse help
315643: @British_Airways That's rubbish, she has paid for her flights. There was an emergency and she had to fly out earlier with a different carrier due to cost.
British_Airways: @315643 order they're sold to you.  If you fail to do so, then it will be registered as a no show and the return leg is automatically (2/3)
British_Airways: @315643 Once a return ticket is sold, it must be used as a return, not a one way ticket, I'm afraid. We're sorry for your poor experience.^LW
summary: Customer is complaining about not being able to use the ticket for return journey. Agent states that it gets cancelled if the onward journey has not made.

dialog:
315643: @British_Airways My partner booked a return flight, did not go on the outward journey and now can't check in on her flight back, plse help
British_Airways: @315643 Hi Paul, sorry to hear this. Unfortunately, when you book a ticket with us you agree that your flights are taken 1/2
315643: @British_Airways That's rubbish, she has paid for her flights. There was an emergency and she had to fly out earlier with a different carrier due to cost.
British_Airways: @315643 Hi Paul.  We're sorry you remain unhappy.  It's in the T & C's on our website.  You have to use the coupons in sequence and in the (1/3)
British_Airways: @315643 Hi Paul.  We're sorry you remain unhappy.  It's in the T & C's on our website.  You have to use the coupons in sequence and in the (1/3)
British_Airways: @315643 order they're sold to you.  If you fail to do so, then it will be registered as a no show and the return leg is automatically (2/3)
315643: @British_Airways Your rules not the rules and one doesn't know about your rules until something happens. Pay for something it's yours to use how you see fit
British_Airways: @315643 Once a return ticket is sold, it must be used as a return, not a one way ticket, I'm afraid. We're sorry for your poor experience.^LW
summary: Customer is enquiring about the refund of return flight which his wife booked but couldn't go outward journey because of some emergency, now she is unable to check in on her flight back. Agent apologized and states that once the return ticket is sold they should use as return not the one way ticket.

GWRHelp: @452732 2/2 I can see a single on the 08.15 for 22/11/2017 priced at ¬£34.00 and a fare for ¬£43.00 on the same train but for the 22/12/2017 - Josh

summary: Customer is enquiring about why the Price variation for the same journey but different dates. Agent informed that Pricing does vary on advance tickets as they are first come first serve,So when the cheaper tickets have sold only standard fares remain.

GWRHelp: @452732 There isn't as much advance fare availability around Christmas as we expect it to be a busy time for travelling. -Andy
GWRHelp: @452732 What time are you travelling? As our trains are running from Marylebone instead of Paddington reservations not possible on all. -Andy
summary: Customer is enquiring about the difference in the cost to exeter on different dates. Agent says the trains are running from marylebone instead of paddington reservation not possible on all.

dialog:
237700: @Delta to qualify for 2018 status - can I spend money in 2017 for travel in 2018? Trying to hit my MQDs by end of year.
Delta: @237700 Hi, there. Unfortunately, MQM and MQD credit is added to your account once the flights are completely flown. *CTR
Delta: @237700 Of course! However, with the tickets you book for others, you will not earn the MQDs or MQMs for their tickets when they fly. *TBW
Delta: @237700 You could purchase the tickets on your Platinum Delta SkyMiles American Express credit card to reach the MQD waiver. *TBW
summary: Customer is questioning can they spend money in 2017 for the travel in 2018 to qualify the 2018 status and trying to hit their MQD's by the end of the year. Agent updates that they can purchase the tickets on their platinum delta sky miles american express credit card to reach the MQD waiver and the other way is to spend $25000 on thei delta amex within end of the year.

697992: @Delta I was wanting to look into possibly upgrading my seat (GINX36) but the seating chart says 1st class and delta comfort are all gone. That's impossible.
Delta: @697992 Thanks for your patience.  I'm showing First Class is sold out for your flights; however, Delta Comfort + is available.  The Delta Comfort + cabin is sold as a fare for this market; therefore, in order to confirm Comfort + there will be a difference in the fare.   *HML
Delta: @697992 Thanks for your patience.  I'm showing First Class is sold out for your flights; however, Delta Comfort + is available.  The Delta Comfort + cabin is sold as a fare for this market; therefore, in order to confirm Comfort + there will be a difference in the fare.   *HML

783452: @VerizonSupport  internet and fios down 5 hours when message told it would be on in 1 hour. Unable reach support  online. Could you help
VerizonSupport: @783452 Thank you for confirming. We would like to try to reset the battery backup unit which will trigger a reset to the main network terminal. Do you know where the batter backup unit is at in the home? It may look like one of the following models.
^HSB https://t.co/39jLp2FZ4n
VerizonSupport: @783452 Press and hold the alarm silence or ONT reset button in for 30 seconds. Wait five minutes, reset the router and test your service.
^NHP
VerizonSupport: @783452 Thanks, since all services are impacted we want to verify that there is a green system status light on the unit. When the alarm silence button was held down did the unit beep? Try to hold down the alarm silence button for 20 seconds and see if light goes off. ^JRA
VerizonSupport: @783452 Thank you, that would indicate a reboot. If services are not back sign in with your credentials to check for outages at https://t.co/Rgex47iNuj We will be here if you require further support.  ^JRA
summary: Customer is complaining about the internet and tv which is down from past 5  hours. Agent stated that if services are not signing in back with their credentials, they can check for outages at the given URL for further support.

dialog:
655671: @British_Airways left my laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Your new lost property procedures are a shambles.  Nobody knows what to do and to have to wait 24 hours is shocking.  Seat 1a in club Europe.  Shocking
British_Airways: @655671 Hi Craig, anything left on board that's found, is handed in to Lost Property at the airport. It can take over 24 hours to be logged 1/2
655671: @British_Airways I was also sent from person to person as the new rules are confusing as well as being on hold for 1 hour at the baggage office.  In the end I drive back to LHR to try and retrieve it but with NO luck
British_Airways: @655671 has to be located and logged before we can reunite it with the passenger. You will need to continue to contact the airport directly. 2/2
655671: @British_Airways I now have my laptop back but it cost me a total of ¬£40 to have it sent back to Edinburgh.  Then Another ¬£28 to call the number your advisor told me to call to report it.  Why not give out the low rate number.  Shocking, especially when they didn‚Äôt even speak when I got through.
summary: Customer is complaining about the new lost property procedures where nobody knows what to do and has to wait for 24 hrs since they have left the laptop on the flight down from Edinburgh. Agent apologies for the problems they have with lost property and for the inconvenience of being without their laptop.

267937: @Delta your seat tick request policy sucks!! I am a ff and you lock out seats forcing us to have to go to the counter and wait for a ticket
267937: @Delta We book last minute now we have to wait for a ticket disregarding the app we had plenty of seats 26 to be exact
Delta: @267937 Unfortunately, booking 3 hours before a flight departs, you will have this problem. For security reasons, the airport has to take control of the flight, that close to departure, and seats and upgrades will need to be processed by the Gate Agent. Sorry, for the inconvenience. *TMA
Delta: @267937 Unfortunately, booking 3 hours before a flight departs, you will have this problem. For security reasons, the airport has to take control of the flight, that close to departure, and seats and upgrades will need to be processed by the Gate Agent. Sorry, for the inconvenience. *TMA
Delta: @267937 Unfortunately, that's our company's operational and security policy, and our airport employees have to take control of the flights in the timeframes that your encountering.  It's not an insult, it's just provided information.  Sorry. *TMA
summary: Customer is complaining about the seat ticket request policy where they locked their seats and forced them to go to counter and wait for the ticket. dialog:
280379: @Tesco I need to do an grocery online order is there a maximum number of an individual item I can order? I need lots of flour and shaving foam for a show I‚Äôm working on
Tesco: @280379 Hi Ruth, thanks for getting in touch. This is a hard question to answer as certain items in-store have a bulk buy limit and others don't. With regards to Flour & Shaving Foam I can't see why we would have a limit on these. 1/2
Tesco: @280379 When ordering you can add "Picker Notes" so my colleagues in store can substitute you with an alternative should there not be enough of the item you have requested. I hope this helps. TY - Chris
Tesco: @280379 Would you mind sending me a DM with your postcode, quantities and which ones you were after please? I'll then check which store serves you to see if they can meet a large amount on a delivery 2/3
Tesco: @280379 It's possible that it may require you to go in to the store and make a customer order to have the items ordered in specifically for you. What day were you planning on making the order for please? - David 3/3 https://t.co/py5Z991Bme
summary: Customer wants to order grocery online. Agent is comforming the day when orderwill  be placed.

dialog:

280379: @Tesco That‚Äôs great I never knew about picker notes! It wouldn‚Äôt matter what sort of flour so I could add that. I knew some items were restricted to stop bulk buying but didn‚Äôt know what was included

dialog:
280379: @Tesco I need to do an grocery online order is there a maximum number of an individual item I can order? I need lots of flour and shaving foam for a show I‚Äôm working on
Tesco: @280379 Hi Ruth, thanks for getting in touch. This is a hard question to answer as certain items in-store have a bulk buy limit and others don't. With regards to Flour & Shaving Foam I can't see why we would have a limit on these. 1/2
Tesco: @280379 When ordering you can add "Picker Notes" so my colleagues in store can substitute you with an alternative should there not be enough of the item you have requested. I hope this helps. TY - Chris
Tesco: @280379 Hi Ruth, the problem with something like this is not just the weight restrictions that come into play but also we need to ensure that all stock isn't going to just one customer. So they've got to consider in-store customers as well 1/3
Tesco: @280379 It's possible that it may require you to go in to the store and make a customer order to have the items ordered in specifically for you. What day were you planning on making the order for please? - David 3/3 https://t.co/py5Z991Bme
summary: Customer wants to place a huge order of flour and shaving foam. Also expects for fast delivery. Agent asked customer to place an order at the shop since the quantity is more and also informed that they have replied to the DM.

dialog:
179920: Issue while exporting a PPro seq in AME - colors over saturated & 1 shot was too bright & washed out. Any thoughts? #postchat #PremierePro
179920: @AdobeCare Everything looks fine straight out of PPro. Tried rendering ProRes 422HQ & H.264 w/ modified Vimeo settings from AME. Had issues on both.
AdobeCare: @179920 In AME preferences, General > Premiere Pro > Uncheck "Import Sequences natively"; Media > Uncheck "Enable accelerated Intel h.264" & test.
summary: Customer complaint about facing an issue while exporting aPPro seq in AME. Agent request customer to check with AME settings.

dialog:
179920: Issue while exporting a PPro seq in AME - colors over saturated & 1 shot was too bright & washed out. Any thoughts? #postchat #PremierePro
AdobeCare: @179920 Hi Clint, are colors exporting fine in PPro? Change the renderer in Media Encoder & try export again. Thanks. ^VS
179920: @AdobeCare The crazy thing is, only 1 shot out of a 15-min seq looked too bright & washed out. Other shots looked over saturated.
AdobeCare: @179920 In AME preferences, General > Premiere Pro > Uncheck "Import Sequences natively"; Media > Uncheck "Enable accelerated Intel h.264" & test.
summary: Customer having an issue while exporting a PPro seq in AME. Agent done with some troubleshooting in AME and updated the customer to reach back for anything else.

AdobeCare: @179920 Let the expert review & respond. ^Raj
AdobeCare: @179920 In AME preferences, General > Premiere Pro > Uncheck "Import Sequences natively"; Media > Uncheck "Enable accelerated Intel h.264" & test.
summary: Customer is having an issue while exporting a PPro seq in AME color over saturated. Agent asked is the colors exporting fine in PPro and informed that let the expert review and respond.Finally informed the customer in AME preferences,General &gt,Premiere Pro &gt,Uncheck Import sequences natively,media &gt, uncheck enable accelerated intel h.264  &amp and test.

139343: @BofA_Help How do BankAmeriDeals work? I added one and used it but nothing is showing up as earned?

422109: @UPSHelp Hey there, I have a package that‚Äôs been stuck in ZhengZhou, China since 11/15. Originally the date of delivery was 11/24. Then switched to 11/21. Now there is no information available. What is happening with my delivery?
UPSHelp: @422109 Hello, please click the link to DM us with your tracking and phone number. ^E.W. https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ
UPSHelp: @422109 Customs is a government process that UPS has no control over. We have to wait for the packages to be released, the same as the customers. ^E.W. https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ
UPSHelp: @422109 I show that this package has been requested to be held for pickup.  Please DM us if anything further is needed. ^RF
422109: @UPSHelp Yes because for some reason the driver thought a signature was required, even though the shipper did not request that. So I‚Äôll go pick it up myself since you‚Äôre not capable of delivering it.
summary: The customer enquires why the product he ordered was not delivered at the proper time and says that he will pick it up for himself since the company was not capable of delivering it. The agent informs that Custom is a government process that UPS has no control over and they will have to wait for the packages to be released, the same as the customers and asks to DM to assist further on the issue.

dialog:
422109: @UPSHelp Hey there, I have a package that‚Äôs been stuck in ZhengZhou, China since 11/15. Originally the date of delivery was 11/24. Then switched to 11/21. Now there is no information available. What is happening with my delivery?
UPSHelp: @422109 Hello, please click the link to DM us with your tracking and phone number. ^E.W. https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ

Please continue to track at https://t.co/5oMU69kAgc. ^TV https://t.co/wKJHDXWGRQ

Agent updates that the scheduled delivery date will be 11/21, and the delay was due to some customs, and requests to DM them for further assistance.

dialog:
276839: @MicrosoftHelps What's up with Groove on W10 Mobile being so utterly broken? Why is it refusing to add music to my library, still, after two years? Are you actively seeking to put those of us who have spent hundreds of our hard-earned shekels on your hardware off using it?
276839: @MicrosoftHelps Getting no error message and no acknowledgement of the files on the SD card. Nothing at all happening. This is only the Mobile version of Groove; the Desktop version is fine. I gather the issue is the library cache being gummed with old data and needs clearing (1/2)
276839: @MicrosoftHelps (2/2) but I don't have the permissions to wipe the relevant %localappdata% subdir like on Desktop, and I am *not* prepared to hard reset my device. I either want access to %localappdata% or I want this bug to be fixed (this century, preferably).
MicrosoftHelps: @276839 Let's fix this. We suggest that you check the app updates. From app list, go to Microsoft Store > Menu > Downloads and updates > Get updates. Refer to this link for more info: https://t.co/cbsWoxsaeZ. Let us know how it works.
summary: Customer is complaining about the Groove on W10 mobile which is refusing to add music to their library still after 2 years. Agent suggests to contact the Answer Desk Support for more details  through the given link.

344741: @British_Airways i have a few questions for you if you could get back to me that would be great
344741: @British_Airways 1. I was wondering can put a lock on my luggage that I check in to go under the plane or can I not have a lock on it.
344741: @British_Airways 2. Am I able to bring my laptop on the plane with me to watch movies on my laptop
British_Airways: @344741 Hi Andrew. Yes, you can put a small padlock on your checked baggage. You can also take a laptop on the plane, 1/2
344741: @British_Airways Well I'm traveling from PHX to Dublin and my flight is on Feb 15 and I want to make sure I have everything ready and prepared before that
British_Airways: @344741 We understand, Andrew. With regards to the padlock we'd recommend you take a TSA approved lock. Do you have any other questions? ^Steph
summary: Customer was wondering to put lock on  my luggage that can check in to go under the plane or can not have a lock on it and also can bring laptop on the plane to watch movies on my laptop. Agent says with regards to the padlock we'd recommend you take  a TSA approved lock.

dialog:
270787: @115722 can you guys help me? my router is plugged in and everything is connected but there‚Äôs a red globe and https://t.co/w8L8RQFVEC says i have no coax connection. please help
VerizonSupport: @270787 We can help! Try a manual reboot. Do so by unplugging the router and unscrewing the coax cable. After 3mins, re-screw the coax cable and plug in the router. This should help! Let us know. ^DDG
270787: @VerizonSupport Have done this 30 times but will try again
VerizonSupport: @270787 Thank you for trying. Do you have access to your battery backup unit? It is usually a black or white box with blue buttons mounted on a wall in a closet or garage. ^DDD
270787: @VerizonSupport The light is green and there is no alarm button
summary: Customer is complaining that his router is plugged in and everything is connected but there's a red globe and said have no coax connection. Agent updated that to reset and restore their services.

dialog:
270787: @115722 can you guys help me? my router is plugged in and everything is connected but there‚Äôs a red globe and https://t.co/w8L8RQFVEC says i have no coax connection. please help
VerizonSupport: @270787 We can help! Try a manual reboot. Do so by unplugging the router and unscrewing the coax cable. After 3mins, re-screw the coax cable and plug in the router. This should help! Let us know. ^DDG
VerizonSupport: @270787 Thank you for trying. Do you have access to your battery backup unit? It is usually a black or white box with blue buttons mounted on a wall in a closet or garage. ^DDD
VerizonSupport: @270787 Press and hold the blue "ONT Reset" button down for 20secs. This should reset and restore your services. Let us know if this helps. ^DDG
summary: Customer is requesting to help as the router is plugged in and everything is connected but still there is a red globe and it says that they don't have coax connection. Agent updates to press an hold the blue "ont reset" button down for 20 secs ehich will reset and restore their services.

520594: @LondonMidland hello can you please tell me whether I can use this pass for Warrington to euston train on Saturday? https://t.co/uqEENhRgZz
LondonMidland: @520594 Hi, we do not run from Warrington and they are only valid to use on London Midland services.
LondonMidland: @520594 you can go from Lime St. There will be a change at Crewe or Stafford or you can go via Birmingham New St as long as it's with us!
520594: @LondonMidland Thanks for the help? Do we need to purchase tickets or can we just get on train and show our passes to conductor?
LondonMidland: @520594 yes, no need to book or buy anything else, just show them to platform & on board staff as you go
summary: Customer inquiring about the train pass. Agent suggest customer not to buy any tickets as the pass is enough for journey.

656760: Damned if I ever set foot on a @SouthwestAir flight again. Response to the #MCO hiccup has been a comedy of errors. We're still imprisoned in the plane now, an hour and a half after they reopened the terminal.
SouthwestAir: @656760 We apologize for the issues tonight. Please know this is a security issue that is affecting all airlines flying in and out of Orlando. ^CC
656760: @SouthwestAir Yes, and it's been resolved. For. Over. An. Hour. Southwest employees are confining us on an *inbound* flight, instead of letting us get off to the terminal which, again, *is already cleared.* That's not on security. That's on you.
SouthwestAir: @656760 It actually has not been resolved. The terminal is currently closed to all Passengers. ^CC
656760: @SouthwestAir @126260 Yes. I know you're giving me incorrect information. That's why I'm trying to set you straight so you can find out who's responsible for the three hours time I'll have to bill you for.
summary: Customer is complaining about the terminal of the flight. Agent updates that they will have on their way ASAP.

dialog:
766089: @Tesco searching google for a PS4 highlighted your ¬£199.99 offer in store (500gb plus FIFA 18) Went to store to be told it is not a genuine offer. Can this be removed? Very misleading!
766089: @Tesco Hi, open google, type in PS4 and it is top of the list for shopping on the right of the page
Tesco: @766089 Hi Mark, thanks for getting back in touch. It looks like this is through an outward link. As our direct site and stores are separate areas of the business with their own stock, promotions and prices can sometimes vary 1/2
Tesco: @766089 Hi Mark, I'm sorry regarding this situation, allow us to elaborate. This is an offer we previously had as an online deal, as such some search engines will still contain cached results of our products and deals.

1/2
Tesco: @766089 We therefore cannot be held responsible for any offers that aren't directly on our page as we have no control over cached versions of search results. Hope this makes sense, let us know if we can help further. - Thanks - David

2/2
summary: Customer is complaining that they found PS4 highlighted their $199.99 offer in store when searched in google, when they visited the store, they got to know that the offer was not genuine. Agent updates that this offer they had previously for an online deal and they are not responsible for any offers which are not directly from their own page.

681853: @British_Airways quick question: how can I change the language in which the emails are sent please? My parents don't speak English and I can't find how to set the language to French.
681853: @British_Airways quick question: how can I change the language in which the emails are sent please? My parents don't speak English and I can't find how to set the language to French.
681853: @British_Airways How can I make sure the e-mails they receive regarding their booking are in French rather than in English? 
Is there a way to change the default language?
British_Airways: @681853 Hi there, we can resend emails in a different language, but we're unable to change the language settings on the booking. If they get in touch, we'll be able to send the email they require. ^Chris

AppleSupport: @662950 We'd like to try a few steps to see if we can reach a resolution for this. The first is an SMC reset. Please do the steps for your specific type of Mac here: https://t.co/460MSj5yQz

dialog:
221917: @Delta I waited over 40 minutes for my bag on Saturday in Atlanta when I returned from Cabo San Lucas.
Delta: @221917 We must do better, Kevin. Company policy allows you to report our failure to deliver your bags on time up to 3 days after it's occurred. I regret that this period has passed to seek recourse, but you may follow this link to seek recourse for late baggage... 1/2
Delta: @221917 Certainly hoping it won't happen again and that the provided link will be unnecessary. We have the "Bags On Time Guarantee" for your benefit, and so please feel urged to report delayed baggage right away should it occur again. We hope your future travel is delay-free! *ADB
Delta: @221917 Oh, doggone. Yes, it was worth a shot this time, yet we cannot manipulate the date. It must be reported no later than three days to be investigated.

From here out, hope this won't be the case as you've described and that your bags arrive expeditiously to you within 20 mins. *ADB
summary: Customer is complaining that they waited over 40 mins for their bag on Saturday in Atlanta when they returned from Cabo San Lucas. Agent updates that it must be reported no later than three days to be investicated.

819581: @VerizonSupport My internet went out and it now says limited on my router has an orange light any way i can get help on how to fix or a number to call?
VerizonSupport: @819581 We can help! Try a manual reboot. Do so by unplugging the router and unscrewing the coax cable. After 3mins, re-screw the coax cable and plug in the router. This should help! Let us know. ^DDG
VerizonSupport: @819581 We can help! Try a manual reboot. Do so by unplugging the router and unscrewing the coax cable. After 3mins, re-screw the coax cable and plug in the router. This should help! Let us know. ^DDG
VerizonSupport: @819581 Can you unplug the power for about 30 seconds to a minute then return the power?
^HSB

135552: We're in @marksandspencer We received 'normal' customer service.... I feel violated... I'm used to the Princess treatment in Marks's!
135552: @marksandspencer It was just the cafe, rest of the store was the usual superb standard... as I said, nothing wrong, just usually staff offer to carry your tray etc when you're already carrying a baby x
marksandspencer: @135552 We're sorry help wasn't offered today :( Which store did you visit so we can let our Cafe Manager know? We'll definitely do better next time!
135552: @marksandspencer It was High Wycombe. Like I said, not bad service in anyway... I've just gotten used to being spoilt by all your other stores (and I regularly contact them to say so üòÅ)
marksandspencer: @135552 We'll let our Management team know what you've said. We should always be offering to help out with trays. We'll make sure we spoil you next time you visit! :)
135552: @marksandspencer Well that's why I ALWAYS go to M&S! (Ps... I also wasn't asked/given the opportunity to use my Sparks Card)
marksandspencer: @135552 We're sorry you weren't asked about your Sparks card either :( We've fed this back too. If you've keep hold of your receipts, we'll add your points for you whenever you're next in store.
marksandspencer: @135552 We're sorry you weren't asked about your Sparks card either :( We've fed this back too. If you've keep hold of your receipts, we'll add your points for you whenever you're next in store.

dialog:
231726: @VirginAtlantic paid for 3 extra leg room seats and reserved a bulkhead seat for a baby from Orlando to Gatwick and have been given regular seats and told to complain when get home even though we need the leg room! Great service üëè #useless #takeyourmoney
231726: @VirginAtlantic We had reserved bulkhead both journeys and have not been given it however on the way out a family of 4 had bulkhead with 1 child. We were given no explanation just told to complain when got home. We paid for something we need and instead will be cramped for 8 hours now! Thanks!!
VirginAtlantic: @231726 The cost should be refunded to you. I'm really sorry but seating is something that can change from time to time. ^J
VirginAtlantic: @231726 There's lots of different reasons seats in your cabin can change. It isn't something we can guarantee 100% ^J
VirginAtlantic: @231726 There's lots of different reasons seats in your cabin can change. It isn't something we can guarantee 100% ^J
summary: Customer is complaining that they were denied from having extra leg room seats without any explanation. Agent states that there are lots of different reasons for changing the seats in a cabin and assures that the costs would be refunded.

dialog:
231726: @VirginAtlantic paid for 3 extra leg room seats and reserved a bulkhead seat for a baby from Orlando to Gatwick and have been given regular seats and told to complain when get home even though we need the leg room! Great service üëè #useless #takeyourmoney
VirginAtlantic: @231726 Bulkhead seats aren't pre-booked Michael they are only on request. Do you mean exit seats? ^J
231726: @VirginAtlantic We were told they can‚Äôt be guaranteed as other children and disabled may need but a family had whole row with only 1 child. However as stated we PAID for 3 extra leg room seats which we have not been given!
VirginAtlantic: @231726 The cost should be refunded to you. I'm really sorry but seating is something that can change from time to time. ^J
summary: Customer is complaining about the service where they paid for 3 extra leg room seats and reserved a bulkhead seat for a baby from Orlando to Gatwick and they were give regular seats and was told to complaint after reaching home. Agent updates that bulkhead seat aren't pre-booked, and there is lot of difference reasons seats in their cabin can change which they can't guarantee and tells that the cost will be refunded back.

dialog:
286702: Just got a friendly reminder from @VerizonSupport support my bill is due. 

Also a friendly reminder I should downgrade. I‚Äôve never gotten 1gbps down. Why should I pay for it?
VerizonSupport: @286702 Is this for your Verizon residential or Verizon wireless mobile?

^ADP
286702: @VerizonSupport Residential, FiOS. But I‚Äôve had the issue before. Your speed test tool says I do, every other speed test tool says I don‚Äôt.
286702: @VerizonSupport My internet is fine now. It‚Äôs just that when I do have real issues, your tools report no problem. It‚Äôs very hard for me to gauge/troubleshoot/get help if the prognosis is ‚Äúwe see nothing wrong.‚Äù
VerizonSupport: @286702 Ok, the main thing is if you were able to directly connect a computer to your router with an ethernet cord and run the test at https://t.co/x8wPeoVW9j we would then see an accurate speed test. 
^ADP
VerizonSupport: @286702 Any device that is not connected directly to ethernet  and running on Wifi would be susceptible to  interference, which could lower the results. Our test shows not only what the device is getting with the interference , it also shows what speeds the router is getting. 
^TXA
summary: The customer is asking why he has to pay the bill since he never got 1gbps down and also he is saying that tool is not showing the proper results and reflects no issues even he is facing real issues. Agent replying that if computer directly connected to router it would show  accurate speed in internet.

168530: @AskSeagate Opening from external hard drive. Used TimeMachine in my MacBook Pro for moving files to ext drive

AskSeagate: @168530 Time Machine was not designed to restore on PC. Would recommend contacting Apple to see if this is possible.

164397: Oooookay, why isn't Google Play reading my SD card anymore?
164397: @GooglePlayMusic Hi there, did that: checked to see if the card was legible, changed it back from internal to SD card, cleared cache and restarted
164397: @GooglePlayMusic Nope, sadly. I'm about to uninstall all updates to Google Play Music and reinstall them...
GooglePlayMusic: @164397 Thanks for the follow-up info. Yes you can uninstall & reinstall the Play Music app updates and then restart your device. Hope this helps.
summary: Customer is complaining that Google play is not reading SD card. Agent asked to re install the Google play app.

dialog:
164397: Oooookay, why isn't Google Play reading my SD card anymore?
GooglePlayMusic: @164397 Hi there. Could you restart the device and make sure you're using the most updated version of the Google Play Music app? Keep us posted.
164397: @GooglePlayMusic Hi there, did that: checked to see if the card was legible, changed it back from internal to SD card, cleared cache and restarted
GooglePlayMusic: @164397 Thanks for the follow-up info. Yes you can uninstall & reinstall the Play Music app updates and then restart your device. Hope this helps.
164397: @GooglePlayMusic Reverting to factory and then reinstalling updates seems to have done the trick. Thanks for checking in, and thanks for your assistance!
summary: Customer is complaining why the Google play is not reading their SD card anymore. Agent updates to uninstall , reinstall the play music app updates and then restart the device again.

dialog:
275675: @AppleSupport How do I set my Macbook Pro's resolution to 1280x720 without attaching a 2nd monitor? 13" Mid 2014 with Sierra
AppleSupport: @275675 Try setting that by following this article: https://t.co/jurYWmUNKR

Let us know if this helps.
275675: @AppleSupport I have read a couple of these kinds of articles, but I want this to work without having to attach a second monitor. I just want to set the resolution and then record my screen. And then upload to Youtube.
AppleSupport: @275675 Check these steps out from the article: 
Set the resolution for the primary display: Choose Apple menu > System Preferences, click Displays, then click Display. Pick Scaled, then select one of the options. After Scaled, you should see the resolution you want.
summary: Customer asking that how to set his macbook pro's resolution  to 1280*720 without attaching a 2nd monitor and also set the resolution and record his screen. Agent replying that  try setting by using this url and also  to set the resolution   for primary display choose apply menu & get system  preferences and then click display.

dialog:

Let us know if this helps.
275675: @AppleSupport All those hidden options and buttons work when a second monitor is attached, but I don't always have access to an extra monitor. And also: that's just clumsy. In Windows this is no problem BTW.
AppleSupport: @275675 Pressing the button on its own will not do anything. However, if you press and hold Option and then click the little bubble to the immediate left of the word "Scaled", you should see the other options appear.

dialog:
590826: @AskSeagate Hi! My Samsung M3 portable hard drive is recognised in Disk Management on my Windows 10 laptop but it's not showing up in Windows Explorer for me to access the files and back up to. Any ideas please on what to do?! Thanks in advance.
AskSeagate: @590826 It may be helpful to see how the drive is partitioned in Disk Management. Please share a screenshot of this. Did the drive previously work on this Windows 10 laptop? Any recent software updates? No secret zone set up for the M3 drive?
AskSeagate: @590826 Did you ever set up a password protected "Secret Zone" using the software that came with your M3? The drive should disappear from Disk Management if the drive is not installed on a USB port. Does Disk 1 show even after a reboot when the M3 drive is not installed? Let us know,
AskSeagate: @590826 Can you initialize the drive by right clicking within the box that indicates the drive is not initialized? If disk cannot be initialized, you can try Diskpart but be careful using this to make sure the correct disk is chosen https://t.co/pxR0XO0m5H Both answers will erase data
AskSeagate: @590826 Given your description, if the drive will not initialize no matter what computer/port is tried, and diskpart also does not work, then the drive may be nonfunctional. Check your warranty/return options here https://t.co/qQjhlOwgu1
summary: Customer is complaining about the corrupted external hard disk. Agent states that the drive may be nonfunctional.

253870: @XboxSupport i am currently trying to download a game and it is getting "installation stopped" at 87 and 99 precent, i tried everything i could find online, what do i do please help!!!!
XboxSupport: @253870 Hi there! Is the game on disc or digital, are you using an external hard drive with the console, and is the console plugged into a power strip? ^JL
XboxSupport: @253870 Alrighty, let's unplug the power strip and plug the console directly into a wall outlet as the power strip can cause the console problems.  ^JL
253870: @XboxSupport my installation won't move up unless i'm watching it, what should i do now
XboxSupport: @253870 We would leave the console be until that finishes and let us know if it does not finish up by tomorrow.  ^JL

AppleSupport: @170451 Thanks for verifying. Was your MacBook very recently updated? Is it set to back up automatically using Time Machine? We'd like to share this guide that has information about Power Nap, a feature that can update data while your Mac sleeps: https://t.co/C4p1hZxtxX

225578: @116021 Where do you stand on #NetNeutrality ? Have you expressed that to the FCC? What are your plans if #NetNeutraility is repealed?
CoxHelp: @225578 Hi, Cox never will, nor ever has made any changes with the explicit intent to deceive our customers.  Please know our core value at Cox is to provide our customers with exceptional service for the best value - it's what we've always done and will continue to do!  -Carol (1/2)
CoxHelp: @225578 Cox has every incentive to remain committed to the principles of an open Internet as we realize the importance our customers place on having access to the content of their choice. Read more at https://t.co/752peCEHnL. Thank you. -Lindsey
225578: @CoxHelp Thank you for the reply and the link. However, a couple of questions: "Reestablishing ‚Äòlight-touch‚Äô regulation will return a level of certainty for consumer protections." The reason we're against the repeal of #NetNeutraility is because we don't feel like we will be protected 1/

143178: @127718 @USCellularCares is there a good reason why I‚Äôve been looking at this screen for 5+ Minutes while in Bloomington, IL? I‚Äôm beginning to think that #LTE is just an acronym thrown around for no reason. https://t.co/ZqnDocZzTq
USCellularCares: @143178 Have you tried powering your phone down for about three minutes to reset the phone? ^AH
143178: @USCellularCares Of course. And cycling airplane mode. And closing and reloading apps. This has become the norm for us. Literally everywhere but our tiny hometown gives us little to no data. Cities are terrible for us.
USCellularCares: @143178 That is a partner coverage area. When roaming there is a 500MB data roaming limit which is a reason it could slow down in that area. ^AH
summary: Customer is having an issue with slow network and data consuming in his hometown. Agent updated that when roaming there is 500MB data roaming limit that's the reason for slow down in your hometown.

243908: @MicrosoftHelps My Lumia 950 is constantly uploading, but I have no idea what. No OneDrive/backup. Busy all day, battery draining. Any idea?
MicrosoftHelps: @243908 Hi, Alexander. We're here for you. For us to isolate your concern, can you tell us if your phone is connected to WiFi? If yes, let's turn off the auto sync. Go here to find out how: https://t.co/hCHvOQlxlz.
243908: @MicrosoftHelps Did that, switched off auto sync OneDrive and all backup functions. Phone is still uploading. I run the latest version I believe. https://t.co/pI0rrrVHU8
MicrosoftHelps: @243908 Still here, Alex. We suggest that you try to reset your device using the steps on this link: https://t.co/S4974hb5VD. Start off with a soft reset, then back up your device before proceeding with a hard reset. This allows us to determine if the issue is with the OS.
summary: Customer is complaining that his Lumia 950 is constantly uploading something even after restricting background usage with both WiFi and metered connection. Agent suggests to reset the device by following the steps on the provided link and requests to back up the device before proceeding with a hard reset.

dialog:

NortonSupport: @121868 Sorry Tim, we do not have option to remove expired products from the account. I would suggest that you go ahead and post your (cont)
121868: @NortonSupport If I can't remove expired subscriptions can the red renewal reminder for a sub that I am never going to renew be permanently suppressed?
NortonSupport: @121868 Yes, could you close the reminder and login from an other web browser to see if you still see it? -raj
summary: Customer wants to remove the expired subscriptions from his Norton account and also requests to permanently suppress the renewal reminder popup. Agent states that they do not have any option to remove expired products from the account and requests to close the reminder and login from another web browser.
